content: you have 18 20 row 2 ws sl 2 wyif p to 1 st m1pr turn 22 24 26 28 30 32 34 36 38 40 sts on the row 3 sl 2 wyib k to 1 st before increase m1l turn bn 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 68 72 76 80 row 4 sl 2 wyif p to 1 st before increase m1pr turn total sts repeat row 3 & 4 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 14 after the heel 15 16 17 more times or until you have worked continue knitting the foot to your desired length all sts on the bn 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 ending with the toe 66 70 74 78 on the bn 52 58 64 70 76 82 ★ abbreviations bn - back needle this needle contains the purl this bar second half of the stitches p - purl fn - front needle this needle contains the first round/s - round half of the stitches rs - right side increase - increase ssk - slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise one at k - knit a time then knit these 2 stitches together through k2tog - knit two stitches together the back loop m1l - make 1 left with left needle pick up the bar sl - slip_stitch purlwise between the stitches from front to back knit this st/sts - stitch/stitches bar through the back loop ws - wrong side m1pr - make 1 purl right with left needle pick up wyib - with yarn in back the bar between the stitches from back to front wyif - with yarn in front © 2025 what i knit 2
